getRand(int) - Method in class ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.views.MainActivity
Obtains a random number from 0 - max We use this function for the "I'm" feeling lucky method By generating a number between 0 - max we are ensured that the random position of the story is in the story list For example a list having 3 stories will call this function with input parameter of 3-1 =2 for valid indices then we call the random function that a number between 0-3 is returned
